item.title: Educational Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented freelancer to create short, prewritten scripts into engaging educational videos for our web platform.

Requirements:

*Experience with Synthesia.com or similar AI software for creating
   avatars.
*Ability to deliver high-quality, visually appealing videos.
*Strong attention to detail and adherence to deadlines.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:54 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Elearning Video, Spokesperson Video, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Videography
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Elearning Video, Spokesperson Video, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative Direction for Creators (UGC) - Upwork
item.description:
Task: Provide the creative direction for voice overs (audio recordings), different b-roll shots (app, TV) and creator footage based on each script.

Due Date: Fri (6/22) at latest

Each creator will be given your instructions for different shots and voice recordings. After the footage/recordings are shot, there will be a follow up project for creating videos using them.

Notes:
- If there's any relevant footage from Shari's videos, please keep in mind (to limit what we request from the UGC creators)

Scripts:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WiGNsFt58vSZYuBJx4q4cxeTmh8TETR0bHPNKTwlHKk/edit?usp=sharing


Hourly Range: $10.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:54 UTC
Category: Creative Direction
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social media content - videographers - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for videographer/photographer to shoot content of interiors of homes and use it as content for Instagram.
Must be able to travel to job sites in New York area
Must know how to shoot interiors of homes
Must know how to edit content for social media

Hourly Range: $55.00-$110.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:33 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Architectural Photography, Video Editing, Videography, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Interior Design
Skills: Architectural Photography, Video Editing, Videography, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Interior Design
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
